description: This file defines a REST controller for a Spring Boot application, providing basic endpoints such as welcome, health check, documentation redirect, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing basic endpoints for the notes application, including welcome, health check, documentation redirect, and info endpoints.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message when accessing the root URL.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects to Swagger UI documentation, preserving original request scheme and host.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns the application health status as 'OK'.
